title: Social desirability bias in ego defense mechanisms

content.question: As part of a survey, a researcher asked a group of students the following question: “How likely are you to punch a wall when your partner makes you angry?” Which of the following might the researcher need to consider as they interpret the responses to this question?

choices.label: Responses do not need to be subject to peer review.
Responses need to be replicated before they can be considered valid.
Responses may be subject to the social desirability bias.
Responses from the experimental group will provide the most insight about defense mechanisms.

content.answer: Responses may be subject to the social desirability bias.

topic.text: 4.4: Psychodynamic and Humanistic Theories of Personality
